targets.rawSql:
select avg(months_inactive_12_mon) as avg_inactive_12_month,
avg(months_on_book) as avg_month_on_book,
avg(contacts_count_12_mon) as avg_contacts_12_month,
avg(credit_limit) as avg_credit_limit,
avg(total_relationship_count) avg_product_used_count,
avg(avg_utilization_ratio) as avg_utilization_ratio
-- avg(total_revolving_bal) as avg_rev_bal
from customer_data_history_join
where status = 'Attrited Customer';

panels.title: Attrited Customer

panels.description: Most customers has credit limit below 4K

targets.rawSql: select credit_limit from customer_data_history_join;

panels.title: Credit limit Distribution

panels.description: Mostly, customer has less than $40K income Category

targets.rawSql: select income_category, count(*) from customer_data_history_join group by 1;

panels.title: Income Category Distribution

panels.description: the length of time an attrited customer has been with the company.

targets.rawSql:
select months_on_book
from customer_data_history_join

panels.title: Months on Book Distribution

targets.rawSql:
select  
  age_range, 
  AVG(months_on_book) AS avg_month_on_book,
  AVG(total_relationship_count) AS avg_product_usage 
FROM (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+'
    END AS age_range, 
    months_on_book, 
    total_relationship_count, 
    idstatus
  FROM customer_data_history_join
) AS age_and_status_data 
WHERE idstatus = 2 -- only consider existing customers 
GROUP BY age_range 
ORDER BY age_range;

panels.title: Average Month of Book and Total Product Usage of Attrited Customer in Each Age Range

targets.rawSql:
WITH base_q AS (
  SELECT 
    income_category, 
    status, 
    AVG(months_on_book) AS avg_month_on_book
  FROM customer_data_history_join
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT 
  income_category, 
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Attrited Customer') AS avg_mob_attrited,
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Existing Customer') AS avg_mob_existing
FROM base_q
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC;

panels.title: Average Month of Book in Each Income Category

targets.rawSql:
WITH base_q AS (
  SELECT 
    gender, 
    status, 
    AVG(months_on_book) AS avg_month_on_book
  FROM customer_data_history_join
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT 
  gender, 
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Attrited Customer') AS avg_mob_attrited,
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Existing Customer') AS avg_mob_existing
FROM base_q
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC;

panels.title: Average Month of Book by Gender

targets.rawSql:
select  
  age_range, 
  AVG(months_on_book) AS avg_month_on_book,
  AVG(total_relationship_count) AS avg_product_usage 
FROM (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+'
    END AS age_range, 
    months_on_book, 
    total_relationship_count, 
    idstatus
  FROM customer_data_history_join
) AS age_and_status_data 
WHERE idstatus = 1 -- only consider existing customers 
GROUP BY age_range 
ORDER BY age_range;

panels.title: Average Month of Book and Total Product Usage of Existing Customer in Each Age Range

targets.rawSql:
WITH base_q AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+' 
    END AS age_range, 
    status, 
    AVG(months_on_book) AS avg_month_on_book
  FROM customer_data_history_join
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT 
  age_range, 
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Attrited Customer') AS avg_month_on_book_attrited,
  AVG(avg_month_on_book) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Existing Customer') AS avg_month_on_book_existing
FROM base_q
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

panels.title: Average Month of Book in Each Age Range

total_trans_amt

panels.title: Total Transaction Amount Distribution (Existing Customer)

targets.rawSql:
select
count(*) filter (where status = 'Attrited Customer') as attrited,
count(*) filter (where status = 'Existing Customer') as existing
from customer_data_history_join

panels.title: Customer Count

targets.rawSql:
with base_q as (
select customer_age::text as age, gender,
count(*) filter (where status = 'Attrited Customer') as attrited,
count(*) filter (where status = 'Existing Customer') as existing
from customer_data_history_join
group by 1,2
order by 3 desc
)
select sum(attrited) filter (where gender = 'M') as male_attrited,
sum(attrited) filter (where gender = 'F') as femlate_attrited
from base_q;

panels.title: Attrited Customer by Gender

targets.rawSql:
with base_q as (
select customer_age::text as age, gender,
count(*) filter (where status = 'Attrited Customer') as attrited,
count(*) filter (where status = 'Existing Customer') as existing
from customer_data_history_join
group by 1,2
order by 3 desc
)
select sum(existing) filter (where gender = 'M') as male_attrited,
sum(existing) filter (where gender = 'F') as femlate_attrited
from base_q;

panels.title: Existing Customer based on gander

targets.rawSql:
select customer_age::text,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'M') as Male,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'F') as Female
from customer_data_history_join
where status = 'Attrited Customer'
group by 1
order by customer_age;

panels.title: Age Distribution of Attrited Customer by Gender
The Age of the Most Attrited Female Customer
The Age of the Most Attrited Male Customer

targets.rawSql:
select income_category,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'M') as Male,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'F') as Female
from customer_data_history_join
where status = 'Attrited Customer'
group by 1
order by 1;

panels.title: Attrited Customer by Income Category in Each Gender

targets.rawSql:
select card_category,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'M') as Male,
count(*) filter (where gender = 'F') as Female
from customer_data_history_join
where status = 'Attrited Customer'
group by 1
order by 1 desc

panels.title: Attrited Customer by Card Category in Each Gender

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+' 
    END AS age_range,
    count(*) filter (where idstatus = 1) as Existing_Customer,
    count(*) filter (where idstatus = 2) as Attrited_Customer
 from customer_data_history_join cdhj
 group by 1
 order by 1

panels.title: Count Each Age Categories

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+' 
    END AS age_range,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = 'Unknown') as unknown,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = 'Less than $40K') as less_tran_40K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$40K - $60K') as between_40_and_60K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$60K - $80K') as between_60_and_80,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$80K - $120K') as between_80_and_120K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$120K +') as more_than_120K
 from customer_data_history_join cdhj
 WHERE idstatus = 2
 group by 1

panels.title: Income Category in Each Age Category (Attrited Customer)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 46 AND 55 THEN '46-55'
      WHEN customer_age BETWEEN 56 AND 65 THEN '56-65'
      ELSE '65+' 
    END AS age_range,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = 'Unknown') as unknown,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = 'Less than $40K') as less_tran_40K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$40K - $60K') as between_40_and_60K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$60K - $80K') as between_60_and_80,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$80K - $120K') as between_80_and_120K,
    count(*) filter (where income_category = '$120K +') as more_than_120K
 from customer_data_history_join cdhj
 WHERE idstatus = 1
 group by 1

panels.title: Income Category in Each Age Category (Existing Customer)
